Controls how values will be displayed on control pages, etc. These settings do not affect the underlying value of the data point.

If enabled, the plugin will send one email each day with a summary of select weather information. In order to receive the summary, you must enable notifications of plugin updates within the plugin settings dialog.

Field.tooltip: Check to enable daily weather summary email messages.
Select the time that you would like the weather summary to be sent. It is recommended to set this value to 01:00 or later.
Field.Label: Send Time:

Field.tooltip: Check to suppress severe weather alerts for this device only.

Field.Label: If severe weather alert logging is enabled, checking this box will suppress alerts for this device only.
The image downloader only supports gif, jpg, jpeg, and png extensions. There is no limit to the number of downloader devices you can have.
